title: Smoking Pi & Eating Pie With Cuba
itunes:title: Smoking Pi & Eating Pie With Cuba
description: While part of the show title this week seems like a bad Aerosmith Song, we will kick back and light up Pi on Pi Day, 3.1415. A limited edition cigar, available at 2guyscigars.com. We will also discuss the trip of a lifetime as David Garofalo returns from Cuba and tells us what gifts he brought back for us to smoke and we will find out how much rum he drank but more importantly what some of the best cigars he smoked were. All this and the usual shenanigans that is The Cigar Authority. ﻿
